name: Alcina's guest
description:
Alcina's guest is a romance fan game in which you create a character and navigate conversations with a tall vampire lady.

Controls

Alcina's guest is a mouse-only game.

Drag to move the camera around the map. Click on things to interact with them.

Adjust camera sensitivity in the settings menu. To open the settings menu, click on the button in the top-right corner of the screen.

Ko-fi

Follow my Ko-fi page to find out when I publish a new game. My Ko-fi page is where I'll post future plans for Alcina's guest too.
